{"id":1521525839,"question_id":3226,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1737929855,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1521525839/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number Game","memory":"28.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> numberGame(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> arr(n, 0);\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        for(int i=0; i<n/2; i++) {\n            int alice = nums[2*i];\n            int bob = nums[2*i+1];\n            arr[2*i] = bob;\n            arr[2*i+1] = alice;\n        }\n        return arr;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-game","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
